video.title: Yuki Yuna Is a Hero
video.synopsis: To ward off monster attacks, the deity that protects humanity grants superpowers to the members of a middle school "hero club."

episodes.synopsis: Yuna and her Hero Club friends are transported to a strange forest to become real heroes and fight a mysterious enemy known as the Vertex.
episodes.title: A Maiden's True Heart

episodes.synopsis: The Hero Club deals with the aftermath of their first Vertex battle, and Fu reveals the explanation for their transformation into superheroes.
episodes.title: Noble Thoughts

episodes.synopsis: After a brief break in the real world, the club must battle Vertex Capricorn. It is a rough fight until help arrives from the Taisha organization.
episodes.title: Moral Poise

episodes.synopsis: The heroic friends still have school responsibilities, including Itsuki's upcoming singing test, so the club helps her out with a karaoke rehearsal.
episodes.title: Shining Hearts

episodes.synopsis: To fight the seven remaining Vertex, each girl calls upon her individual Mankai power, risking the loss of one or more physical functions.
episodes.title: Overcoming Adversities

episodes.synopsis: Thinking their battle days are over, Hero Club learns the price of using their Mankai powers, including loss of vision, hearing, taste and speech.
episodes.title: Looking Forward to Tomorrow

episodes.synopsis: To recover from recent adventures, the five friends enjoy "normal" lives, including a relaxing beach trip, but are their fighting days really over?
episodes.title: Pastoral Pleasures

episodes.synopsis: Fu tells the girls their fight is far from over, so they return to the forest accompanied by a familiar face and empowered by a dangerous secret.
episodes.title: God's Blessing

episodes.synopsis: Upon discovering her friends will suffer permanent disabilities from the Taisha's Hero System, Fu threatens to destroy the organization.
episodes.title: Those Who Know Grief

episodes.synopsis: Mimori learns much from Sonoko, including the Shinju's true purpose and its desire for the club to fight the perpetually regenerating Vertex.
episodes.title: Bonds of Love

episodes.synopsis: On a mission to spare her friends from suffering further, Mimori seeks to destroy the Shinju, while the other girls are left to choose sides.
episodes.title: Passion

episodes.synopsis: To cure the afflictions caused by the Vertex and Shinju, the Hero Club must find a way to fight one last united battle using their remaining powers.
episodes.title: Smiling at you
